content: ## Uninstall a community node To uninstall a community node: 1. Go to **Settings** > **Community nodes**. 2. On the node you want to install, select **Options** ![Three dots options menu](/_images/common-icons/three-dot-options-menu.png){.off-glb}. 3. Select **Uninstall package**. 4. Select **Uninstall Package** in the confirmation modal.
